# Setting up Postgresql

First install postgresql, create a data directory, and create a default database.

```
# brew update
# brew unlink postgresql
brew install postgresql
export PGDATA=~/db/postgres-9.5 # set this globally somewhere
initdb -E utf8
createdb
createdb lahman
createdb nycflightd13
```pos

Then on reboot run

```
pg_ctl start
```

## Check connection

From R,

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("RPostgres")
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(), dbname = "hadley")
dbListTables(con)
```
